subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Thomas Vanek scored twice and added three assists, and Jason Pominville had three assists Sunday in leading the host Sabres to a 5-2 season-opening win over the Philadelphia Flyers.
snippet: Thomas Vanek scored twice and added three assists, and Jason Pominville had three assists Sunday in leading the host Sabres to a 5-2 season-opening win over the Philadelphia Flyers.
